Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              -Male / Female, age  30-35  above
              
              -Bachelor / Master  Degree  in  Industrial Engineering , Textile  Engineering , Engineering  Management , Manufacturing  Technology , or  related  fields.
              
              -Experience  in  textile  and  apparel  industry  5  years  up.
              
              -Experienced  in  management  level  and  development  team  of  5  years  up.
              
              -Good  communication  and  coordination  skills.
              
              -Good  command  of  Microsoft  Office  (Word , Excel , PowerPoint ).
              
              -Flent  in  Enlish
              
              -Experience  in  Garment  Business  will  be  an  advantage.
              
              The successful candidates will be given an attractive remuneration package and career opportunities. Please send in your letter of application together with your resume, expected salary, and one recent photo to :
